title: League p2p?
body: So my friend goes to Westpoint In NY and he just received his school official laptop. The rules are he's not allowed to do anything involving P2P connections. So can he play league or no? lol sorry if this is wrong section first time posting!

replies.body:
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/e2/e2494b2dae9d4c537141a47eaad0913f6732f4839e20513804ad74f4fa7d28be.jpg

League doesn't actually use P2P connections anymore I don't believe! Your friend should be just fine ^_^!
Broporo... I have no words to express how happy it makes me to see a Futurama reference on the boards for one of my favorite games. This just made my day!
And I thought only Cactopus was capable of such hilarity on the boards. Clearly I was wrong. Please keep posting these hilarious references on the boards. Please.

Ayyyyyy did you expect much less from a guy with the name Bro-Poro?

http://i.giphy.com/QwH7v7J1tBrq0.gif
I've learned over time to just expect nothing so that everything I find fills me with joy... or whatever emotion is right... I'll remember to always expect hilarity from a guy named Bro-Poro.
Since when did you stop using p2p connection? If im allowed to know. Ty
